original_text: And because of the greatness that he gave him, all peoples, nations, and languages trembled and feared before him. Whom he would, he killed, and whom he would, he kept alive; whom he would, he raised up, and whom he would, he humbled.
korean_text: 그에게 큰 권세를 주셨으므로 백성들과 나라들과 언어가 다른 모든 사람들이 그의 앞에서 떨며 두려워하였으며 그는 임의로 죽이며 임의로 살리며 임의로 높이며 임의로 낮추었더니

sentences.original_text: And because of the greatness that he gave him,
and whom he would, he kept alive;
whom he would, he raised up,
and whom he would, he humbled.
